[ C ] a member of a people who live in Southern Africa: The Zulus are South Africa's largest ethnic group. Zuma is a Zulu and Mbeki is from the Xhosa ethnic group.
[ U ] the language spoken by the Zulu people: He speaks Zulu. She gave us a vocabulary lesson in Zulu, complete with clicks and pops of the tongue.

belonging or relating to a member of a people who live in Southern Africa: a Zulu chief Her nanny, a Zulu woman, introduced her to African mysticism.
belonging or relating to the language spoken by the Zulu people: Laduma is the Zulu word for "goal". Because of her limited knowledge of the Zulu language, she sometimes felt like an outsider.
